channel.title: Coding help plz
channel.description:
Im making a PI server.. I am new to coding and need some help figuring some things out..Meaning i have more then 1 question or i would just ask it on here.. i learn real fast and have done alot of changes on my server.. I host my own Mumble server so i have voice chat to make it easyer.. add me on msn if you would like to help me out...
MSN: lifescapersps@live.com

item.title: Coding help plz
item.dc:creator: @25_2life 25 2life
item.description:
@25_2life wrote:

thank you very much it is helpfull…

Read full topic

item.title: Coding help plz
item.dc:creator: @xXSh0ckXx xXSh0ckXx
item.description:
@xXSh0ckXx wrote:

[quote=“25 2life, post:6, topic:443422”]well im down to 1 problem now for the time being lol… i have summoning and it works far as summoning pets goes… i cannot find the obelisk to train summoning though… i have looked in game and in my files like summoning, objects, and just about anything eles i can find that i think might have to do with it… any ideal?

and this might not be a problem if i can figure out how to add newer maps and npcs…

the only reason im using someones source and client is to just get familer to rsps java codeing then i will get a blank and make my own,…

i dont want to be spoon fed i would like for someone to help teach me how to code with java when i have questions about the code… i have books on my kindle and have links to java learning sites… so i am trying to learn but thier is confusing times that would be nice to be able to just ask someone what blah blah means… which i think iv done pretty good so far for not having any help till now…

thanks in advance for any help…[/quote]

If you dont know how to add the Obelisk for Summoning:

Go to ObjectManager.java

Scroll down Till You See

This [EXAMPLE]

[code]c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(13615, 2002, 4430, 0, 10);//portals
c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(13620, 2007, 4430, 0, 10);
c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(13619, 2014, 4430, 0, 10);

	c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(2213, 3281, 2777, 0, 10);

	c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(4875, 2041, 4523, 1, 10);
	c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(411, 2036, 4533, 2, 10); 
	c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(2213, 2031, 4529, 2, 10); 

	c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(410, 3098, 3503, 0, 10); 

	c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(4874, 3195, 3426, 1, 10);
	c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(4875, 3195, 3424, 1, 10);
	c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(4876, 3195, 3422, 0, 10);
	c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(4877, 3195, 3420, 0, 10);
	c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(4878, 3195, 3418, 0, 10);

	c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(1596, 3008, 3850, 1, 0);
	c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(14367, 3212, 3439, 2, 10); 
	c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(14367, 3213, 3439, 2, 10); 
	c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(411, 3215, 3438, 2, 10); 
	c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(1596, 3008, 3849, -1, 0);
	c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(1596, 3040, 10307, -1, 0);
	c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(1596, 3040, 10308, 1, 0);
	c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(1596, 3022, 10311, -1, 0);
	c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(1596, 3022, 10312, 1, 0);
	c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(1596, 3044, 10341, -1, 0);
	c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(1596, 3044, 10342, 1, 0);
	c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(410, 3226, 3428, 0, 10);
	c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(6552, 3228, 3432, 0, 10);
	c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(6552, 2544, 4722, 0, 10);
	c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(409, 3209, 3438, 0, 10);
	c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(2213, 3047, 9779, 1, 10);

[/code] etc…

Now just Copy That Add this Code in The List

Now Example like this

c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(1596, 3044, 10342, 1, 0); c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(410, 3226, 3428, 0, 10); c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(6552, 3228, 3432, 0, 10); Like this... c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(ID, X, Y, 0, 10); c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(6552, 2544, 4722, 0, 10); c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(409, 3209, 3438, 0, 10); c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(2213, 3047, 9779, 1, 10);
X + Y : Coords
How to get Coords ? Do ::mypos ingame Then you will learn the end Automatically

Hope this helped you for the obelisk

Read full topic

item.title: Coding help plz
item.dc:creator: @25_2life 25 2life
item.description:
@25_2life wrote:

well im down to 1 problem now for the time being lol… i have summoning and it works far as summoning pets goes… i cannot find the obelisk to train summoning though… i have looked in game and in my files like summoning, objects, and just about anything eles i can find that i think might have to do with it… any ideal?

and this might not be a problem if i can figure out how to add newer maps and npcs…

the only reason im using someones source and client is to just get familer to rsps java codeing then i will get a blank and make my own,…

i dont want to be spoon fed i would like for someone to help teach me how to code with java when i have questions about the code… i have books on my kindle and have links to java learning sites… so i am trying to learn but thier is confusing times that would be nice to be able to just ask someone what blah blah means… which i think iv done pretty good so far for not having any help till now…

thanks in advance for any help…

Read full topic

item.title: Coding help plz
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

Post your questions here, and we may be able to help. Do not use Teamviewer/Mumble/etc as the default, or even expected means of assistance.

Read full topic
